name: Castle Black
comment: You feel at home here, Sam seems very eager to talk.

name: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea
comment: One of the only manned castles along the wall. The castle furthest East.

name: Shadow Tower
comment: One of the three remaining manned castles along the wall.

name: Crastor's Keep
comment: Keep your hands off of his daughter wives or he'll kill you. There's some tasty pork roasting over the fire.

name: The Fist of the First Men
comment: A big battle happened here. There is a pile of dragonglass...

name: Hardhome
comment: The wildings have a settlement here. Best not disturb them.

name: Winterfell
comment: My old home. The north remembers.

name: The Dreadfort
comment: The seat of the traitorous House Bolton.

name: Icemark
comment: An abandoned castle along the wall. There's no-one here.

name: Rimegate
comment: An abandoned castle along the wall. There's no-one here.

name: Karhold
comment: A strong, northern castle and the seat of House Karstark.

name: Last Hearth
comment: The castle that belongs the Umbers. They've always been loyal to House Stark...
